name: Disaster Recovery Protection
description: Resources tagged 'disaster-recovery' cannot be deleted or downsized without VP approval

name: Network Security Baseline
description: Network security group changes require security team review before execution

name: Change Window Enforcement
description: Production changes prohibited Friday 5PM through Monday 8AM UTC

name: Cost Change Threshold
description: Actions with greater than $500/month impact require finance team review

name: Critical Resource Protection
description: Resources tagged 'criticality: critical' require change advisory board approval for any modification

name: Shared Resource Protection
description: Resources tagged 'shared' or with multiple consumers cannot be deleted without verifying zero active connections
